Anointed Procession.flavor:
"The gods here may walk among the people, but they are not with them."
—Gideon Jura
Anointed Procession.name: Anointed Procession
Anointed Procession.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

Embalmer's Tools.flavor:
"They might be dead, but these mummies are masters of their trade."
—Jace Beleren
Embalmer's Tools.name: Embalmer's Tools
Embalmer's Tools.text:
Activated abilities of creature cards in your graveyard cost {1} less to activate.
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

Rhonas's Monument.flavor:
"The worthy shall hone a strong body to endure the boundless energies of the afterlife."
—Monument inscription
Rhonas's Monument.name: Rhonas's Monument
Rhonas's Monument.text:
Green creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Oketra's Monument.flavor:
"The worthy shall respect the worthy. In the afterlife, all will stand united."
—Monument inscription
Oketra's Monument.name: Oketra's Monument
Oketra's Monument.text:
White creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.

Fetid Pools.name: Fetid Pools
Fetid Pools.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Fetid Pools enters the battlefield tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Evolving Wilds.flavor:
"Don't you ever wonder what lies beyond the Hekma? Beyond the reach of the gods? Beyond the horns on the horizon?"
—Samut, initiate of Tah crop
Evolving Wilds.name: Evolving Wilds
Evolving Wilds.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Liliana's Mastery.flavor: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."
Liliana's Mastery.name: Liliana's Mastery
Liliana's Mastery.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Trial of Knowledge.name: Trial of Knowledge
Trial of Knowledge.text:
When Trial of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard a card.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Knowledge to its owner's hand.

Trial of Zeal.name: Trial of Zeal
Trial of Zeal.text:
When Trial of Zeal enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Zeal to its owner's hand.

Trial of Ambition.name: Trial of Ambition
Trial of Ambition.text:
When Trial of Ambition enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Ambition to its owner's hand.

Cartouche of Knowledge.flavor: Cartouches chronicle the initiates' achievements in the trials.
Cartouche of Knowledge.name: Cartouche of Knowledge
Cartouche of Knowledge.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

Cartouche of Ambition.name: Cartouche of Ambition
Cartouche of Ambition.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Ambition enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

Dread Wanderer.name: Dread Wanderer
Dread Wanderer.text:
Dread Wanderer enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}{B}: Return Dread Wanderer from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only if you have one or fewer cards in hand.

Lord of the Accursed.flavor: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.
Lord of the Accursed.name: Lord of the Accursed
Lord of the Accursed.text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.

Bontu the Glorified.name: Bontu the Glorified
Bontu the Glorified.text:
Menace, indestructible
Bontu the Glorified can't attack or block unless a creature died under your control this turn.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Bounty of the Luxa.name: Bounty of the Luxa
Bounty of the Luxa.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all flood counters from Bounty of the Luxa. If no counters were removed this way, put a flood counter on Bounty of the Luxa and draw a card. Otherwise, add {C}{G}{U}.

As Foretold.name: As Foretold
As Foretold.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold.
Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.

Khenra Charioteer.name: Khenra Charioteer
Khenra Charioteer.text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.
